items.title: Paul Gauguin Names Special Guests for Arts and Culture Thanksgiving Sailing
items.excerpt: Paul Gauguin Cruises has announced that it will be hosting special guests onboard the Paul Gauguin’s Arts and Culture itinerary for Thanksgiving.

items.title: P&O Cancels Select 2026 and 2027 Sailings on Two Ships
items.excerpt: P&O Cruises is reportedly cancelling select sailings that were scheduled to take place onboard the Arvia and the Ventura in 2026.

items.title: New Legend of the Seas to Enter Service Earlier
items.excerpt: The new Legend of the Seas is set to enter service for Royal Caribbean International earlier that originally scheduled, offering three additional preview cruises.

items.title: Ilma Completes First Year of Service for Ritz-Carlton
items.excerpt: The Ritz-Carlton Yacht Collection’s Ilma recently completed its first year of service after being delivered on July 15, 2024.
